name: Ramesh
description: '''Azar Mohebbi-Tehrani''' ({{langx|fa|آذر محبی تهرانی}}, 13 November 1946 – 28 November 2020), better known by her stage name '''Ramesh''' ({{lang|fa|رامش}}), was an Iranian singer. She performed songs across a variety of genres, including [[Iranian pop music|pop]], [[jazz]], and [[Iranian rock|rock]].
